img.desc: Here’s a view of the temple and the entire surrounding area of Gebel Ghueita as seen by the Quickbird satellite. We’ll be zooming in on the squared-off section.
This view zooms in on the temple site. We haven’t applied any special filters. We can only see structures on the surface.
In this image, we sharpened the edges of the surface structures, and applied one filter that shows more surface detail.
Here, we applied another filter to the image that helps bring out detail in buried structures, which archaeologists might want to investigate.
